# instructions

**Instance Property**

The written instructions for following the path that the step represents.

## Declaration

```swift
instructions: string;
```

## Discussion

MapKit JS localizes the instructions according to the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions] object’s [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/DirectionsConstructorOptions/language] setting.

## Route step details

- **distance**: The step distance, in meters.
- **transportType**: The transport type of the step.
- **TransportType**: The modes of transportation.
